info.name: Login Protect
info.author: Tom Needham
info.summary: Login protection based on IP ranges
info.description: This app allows you to protect admin login to ownCloud to requests originating from a certain set of IP ranges, specified using an OCC command. This can provide some extra security by ensuring admins can only login from within your office for example, or from within your VPN for example, which may enforce extra authentication.
